thread.title: Did La La Land Break All The Records? Here’s All You Need To Know About Oscars 2017
thread.title_full: Did La La Land Break All The Records? Here’s All You Need To Know About Oscars 2017

title: Did La La Land Break All The Records? Here’s All You Need To Know About Oscars 2017
text:
facebook 307 SHARES 
One of the most awaited events of the year, and Hollywood's biggest night, the Oscar Awards Ceremony, just wrapped. And we thought of notifying you of which awards your favourite actor won, and if La La Land broke all the records. Hosted by Jimmy Kimmel, whose political jabs were on fire, here is all that you need to know about the 89th Academy Award winners! 
The big winners : La La Land: 6 Awards 
Best Score 
Best Song, "City of Stars" 
Best Director, Damien Chazelle
